name: Checkbox.Root
description: A control element that allows for multiple selections within a set.
description_zh: A control element that allows for multiple selections within a set.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

checked.description: The checked state of the checkbox

defaultChecked.description:
The checked state of the checkbox when it is first rendered.
Use this when you do not need to control the state of the checkbox.
defaultChecked.description_zh:
复选框首次呈现时的选中状态。
当您不需要控制复选框的状态时，请使用此选项。

disabled.description_zh: 复选框是否处于禁用状态

form.description: The id of the form that the checkbox belongs to.
form.description_zh: 复选框所属表单的 ID。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the checkbox. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 复选框中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

name.description:
The name of the input field in a checkbox.
Useful for form submission.
name.description_zh:
复选框中输入字段的名称。
用于表单提交。

value.description: The value of checkbox input. Useful for form submission.
value.description_zh: 复选框输入的值。用于表单提交。

events.name: checkedChange
events.description: The callback invoked when the checked state changes.
events.description_zh: 选中状态更改时调用的回调。
